name: Monovert DX
description:
Monovert is a 2d puzzle platformer. INVERT the level, changing whether you can go through objects or make them solid. Use this ability so solve the levels puzzles and progress.

Features :


  • 80+ levels
  • Unique gameplay use your color switching ability to solve puzzles
  • 23 Achievements (can you beat the game without dying?)
  • Сontroller support
  • Robots, reverse gravity and more

    How to play



    Keyboard : Press Alt to invert the level
    Xbox Controller : Press B to invert the level
    Turning an object Black makes it Solid
    Turing an object White makes it Hollow
